technology-hero.title: Mektup.co
technology-hero.subtitle: A Secure and Smart Messaging Experience

info.desc: Mektup.co is a SaaS platform that centralizes customer communication for organizations. Our goal is to increase users’ self-service resolution rate, reduce the workload of support teams, and provide a consistent brand experience. In this project, we restructured the information architecture, strengthened the search experience, and built a new design system.

card1.title: Goal
card1.subtitle: Increase the self-service rate
card1.desc: We grouped content by topic to help users find answers faster, added smart search and suggestion cards, and highlighted critical flows (password, billing, integration) with step-by-step guides. Expected impact: +30% increase in self-service score.

card2.title: Goal
card2.subtitle: Reduce the support team workload
card2.desc: We reduced repetitive requests with preventative tips, automatic redirection to FAQ, and in-form suggestions. Thanks to tagging and routing rules, requests were delivered to the right team more quickly. Expected impact: −20% reduction in support workload.

section2.title: Design System
section2.desc: We defined accessible contrast combinations derived from the brand palette; status colors (info/warning/success) were standardized. For headings, fonts such as [e.g., Inter/Medium] were chosen, while [e.g., Inter/Regular] was used for paragraphs. An icon set with balanced stroke weights and a light illustration style supports the friendly tone of the product. This allowed the visual identity to be consistently applied across all digital touchpoints.

table.title: How We Plan the Project Process
